definition: many fleas, but unconcerned (idiom); no point in worrying about one debt when one has so many others/Troubles never come singly./It never rains but it pours.

sentences.english: Study in Chemical Ecology of Tritrophic Interactions Among Rice, Nilaparvata Lugens and Anagrus Nilaparvatae;
sentences.chinese: 水稻，褐飞虱，稻虱缨小蜂的化学生态研究概述。

sentences.english: Brown planthopper , Nilaparvata lugens and white back planthopper , Sogatella furcifera are two kinds of major rice pests in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 褐飞虱与白背飞虱是亚洲稻区的两种重要害虫。

sentences.english: The experiment was conducted to estimate the economic injury level (EIL) and economic threshold (ET) of B. tabaci.
sentences.chinese: 研究了烟粉虱在黄瓜上的经济损害水平和经济阈值。

sentences.english: The metabolic resistance of the brown planthopper, Nilaparvata lugens, to buprofezin and metamidophos was investigated in this article.
sentences.chinese: 说明褐飞虱对这两种药剂的代谢抗性机制存在差异。

sentences.english: The morphological variations of B. tabaci are correlated with the structure of the host leaf.
sentences.chinese: 烟粉虱的形态变异与寄主叶片的结构相关。

sentences.english: The highest variety of non-B biotypes was detected in Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 在云南地区检测到的非B型烟粉虱生物型类型最多。

sentences.english: The experiment was conducted to estimate the economic injury level (EIL) and economic threshold (ET) of B.
sentences.chinese: 研究了烟粉虱在黄瓜上的经济损害水平和经济阈值。

sentences.english: The absorption ability of 160 RIL to BPH was also a polygenic trait.
sentences.chinese: 该群体对褐飞虱的吸引能力也系一数量性状。

sentences.english: The brown planthopper, Nilaparvata lugens (St?l) (Homoptera: Delphacidae), is a classical resurgent pest induced by insecticides.
sentences.chinese: 褐飞虱是由农药引起再猖獗的典型害虫。

sentences.english: In recent years Bemisia tabaci biotype B has become one of the most important insect pests on vegetable crops in China.
sentences.chinese: B型烟粉虱是目前我国蔬菜作物上的主要害虫之一。

sentences.english: The differences in morphological features between Pealius mori (Takahashi) and Bemisia myricaeKuwana were compared.
sentences.chinese: 并比较桑粉虱与杨梅粉虱的主要分类特征。

sentences.english: Scott was robbed once and picked up lice the second time.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在收容所被抢过一次，还两次被除虱。

sentences.english: Effect of different hosts on population outbreak of Bemisia tabaci was researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了不同寄主植物对烟粉虱种群暴发的影响。

sentences.english: The above results suggest that the inheritance of virulence of the brown planthopper may be sex-linked.
sentences.chinese: 以上的结果可推测稻褐飞虱致害性可能属于伴性遗传。

sentences.english: Does it kill ticks as well as fleas?
sentences.chinese: 灭虱与灭蚤的效果是否相同？

sentences.english: Brown planthopper, Nilaparvata lugens, is a major pest of rice.
sentences.chinese: 褐飞虱是我国主要的水稻害虫，有着复杂的空间结构。

definition: moss/lichen/moss on damp walls/used erroneously for 蘇|苏
